Class Game

java.lang.Object
  User
      Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
HangMan
public class Game
extends User

This class controls the aspects of the game by requesting info from a User, updating the game, and then passing the updated game back to the User

Version:
(October 4, 2012 Windows 7(x64) : Java 1.7)
Author:
(Jesse Nelson)

wrongGuess

public void wrongGuess(char c)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
Update the string of wrongLetters, calls decreaseNumberOfGuesses, and checks to see if the Game is over. If the game is lost, GameLost() is called Shows the game to the user
